find-drug-and-effect.template:
Read the below text and answer the question.

Text: {{text}}

Question: What are the drug and its effect of the above text?

You should answer in the "drug" and "effect" format (e.g., alcohol and high blood pressure)
|||
{{drug}} and {{effect}}.

find-drug-and-effect-two-questions.template:
Read the below text and answer the two following questions.

Text: {{text}}

Question 1: What is the drug in the above text?

Question 2: What is the effect of it?

You should answer in the "drug" and "effect" format (e.g., alcohol and high blood pressure)
|||
{{drug}} and {{effect}}.
